mcq.statement: Which reports, besides the Pirpur Report, highlighted the impact of the Wardha Scheme on Muslim children in 1939?

options.a: Sharif Report and Kamal Yar Jung Report
options.c: Simon Commission Report and Cabinet Mission Plan

mcq.one_liner: Besides the Pirpur Report, the **Sharif Report (under M. S. Sharif) and Kamal Yar Jung Report (both in 1939)** highlighted the impact of the Wardha Scheme on Muslim children.
